name: Box Pit
description:
Prevent Boxy from being crushed. To move, click anywhere on the screen drag your mouse away and release. If Boxy is grounded this will fling Boxy in the opposite direction. You don't have to click on the box itself. The amount u fling is based of how long of line u drag. Boxy will reach out in their intended direction. 

Tips: Over time u get slightly bigger and score points for how big you are. If you are hit you get smaller. falling under the board or getting too small is a game over.
